text: I have gotten loans from Horison Credit several times and each time the staff has gone above and beyond to secure the best solution for my current situation. Most importantly they are not only professional and efficient in the process, they are also very respectful and friendly, making each visit feel like getting help from a friend rather than from a credit company. CK processed my loan today and I would like to express my appreciation for his excellent service, he is very understanding and thoughtful, and made me feel at ease throughout the whole process. At the same time he was very efficient in the processing of the loan, which was a great solution he helped to facilitate üëçüèºüëçüèºüëçüèº

Was hesitate to walk in for the start however still decided to try , end day no regrets was assign to Consultant CK and the whole experience was awesome and wholesome he manage to get me a good amount and was very flexible the whole time and will make you feel comfortable and assure. So highly recommend and don't need to hesitate.

Grace is very patient and detailed by explaining what are the best alternative and solutions for me. She had provided the extra mile service and have the best interest for her client. Keep it up and thank you once again for her service.

Thanks CK for assisting me with my application process was fast and swift, he explained the terms and conditions to me clearly, making me felt so safe and secured for letting him process my application will definitely come back again if I every needed help
Good Service By CK, Quick and Fast yet Professional. Thank you so much for your assistance will definitely come back in future if i ever in need!!!!
